points.point: Lead a team to develop a mental health awareness application
Cross-platform development using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React-Native, NodeJS) and Expo
Implemented an easy to navigate user-interface and basic user security with hasing.
Integrated with Tumblr API and implemented a recommendation system with TensorflowJS to provide user with user-tailored responses.
Collabotred in a small team to develop two versions of Battle Ship using JS/CSS/HTML and PyGame.
Designed and implemented game logic using JavaScript.
Refactored code and implemented new features to existing command-line version of BattleShip. Updated from CLI to GUI using PyGame.
Implemented multiple difficulties of computer controlled bots for single player gameplay
Worked with World Wide Technologies to develop a dispatcher for managing intake, delivery, an stock in a large warehouse
Implemented Q-learning algorithm to train dispatcher.
Improved efficiency over reedy based approaches by 20\%.
